```{r}
library(knitr)
library(AMCP)
library(car)
library(pander)
library(ztable)
library(emmeans)

opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, comment = NULL, highlight = FALSE)
options(ztable.type = "html")
options(scipen=1, digits=3)

data(C7T5)
df <- within(C7T5, {
  Feedback <- factor(Feedback)
  Drug     <- factor(Drug)
})

```

# ANOVA

Some text.

```{r, results = 'asis'}
mod <- lm(Score ~ Feedback*Drug, df)

ztable(aov(mod), digits = 3)
```

# Other stuff


```{r}
emmeans(mod, "Drug")
```
```{r}
emmeans(mod, "Feedback")
```

```{r}
emmip(mod, Feedback ~ Drug)
```


```{r}
emmip(mod, Drug ~ Feedback)
```


```{r}
emmod <- emmeans(mod, pairwise ~ Drug)
emmod
```
